ygData.subject: RE: Ideas...
ygData.msgSnippet: Just as a little aside, Ak Anon is the only zone that Geoffrey Zatkin did. Those that don t know GZ, he is the man behind the magic system in EQ.  He also
ygData.messageBody:
Just as a little aside, Ak'Anon is the only zone that Geoffrey Zatkin did.
Those that don't know GZ, he is the man behind the magic system in EQ. He
also loves hiding stuff. I suspect that if any city does have a secret
area, then it's Ak'Anon.

-----Original Message-----
From: kyx2000@... [mailto:kyx2000@...]
Sent: Sunday, October 17, 1999 5:35 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Ideas...


From: "" <kyx2000@...>

Alright, here is a quick report, so you don't have to do what i did over
again, reguarding the star gadget thing. I had a partner stand by the star
and keep it turned, here is what it doesn't do: Open the chest near the fish

goods selling clockwork. Open up anything in the deep deep pool of water in
the very back of Ak'anon by the junk yard man. Open up anything in the zoo
or the rest of that building, open up anything in the two smaller towers
outside of the castle. I havn't searched the castle itself, or the mines, or

near the gate, or anywhere else i havn't mentioned. The door sound you hear
when you turn the crystal is just the crystal itself turning, if it does in
fact open something up, its not near by, i have also eliminated that, and
also, we checked the sound out, and the farther you are away from the
crystal the feinter the sound becomes, so its not the door yourself you are
hearing. It might just not open anything at all, wouldn't be suprised, but
that would also be a waste of a hidden little level, anyway, i doubt i will
do a whole lot more searching, as its pretty boring, but i did a lot
already, try and work from there if you can, i would like to see if this
thing does anything.
